## Overall RS

$$
\overline{RS}=\sum_{i=1}^{n}\mathrm{RS}_{i} w_{i}
$$

Where $\sum_{i=1}^n w_{i}=1$

## Cumulative Extent of Decline
$$
\mathrm{cED}(x) = \sum \begin{cases}
      w_{i}, & \text{if}\ \mathrm{RS}_{i} â‰¥ x\\
      0, & \text{if}\ \mathrm{RS}_{i} < x \\
    \end{cases}
$$

## Area under the cED curve

$$
\mathrm{AUC}_{\mathit{cED}}=\int_{0}^{1} \mathrm{cED}(x)\,dx
$$
